column1: #text=I needed to visit my Grandma upstate , so I decided to take a train .
#text=I purchased my tickets online and printed out a receipt .
#text=The next day , I headed over to the train station and checked in at the ticket counter .
#text=I was early , so I picked a spot on a bench and sat down .
#text=After a short while , everybody lined up to get on the train .
#text=A train worker checked all of our tickets .
#text=I entered the train and picked out a seat for myself .
#text=Once everyone was on the train , our conductor announced that we were leaving the station .
#text=Another train worker came around and took everyone 's tickets from them .
#text=I spent the ride looking at scenery out the window and reading mostly .
#text=Eventually , the train conductor announced my stop .
#text=I retrieved my bag from the overhead compartment , and headed downstairs and off of the train .
